thread.title: Toronto Raptors cut four players ahead of Wednesday’s season opener
thread.title_full: Toronto Raptors cut four players ahead of Wednesday’s season opener

title: Toronto Raptors cut four players ahead of Wednesday’s season opener
text:
Basketball Toronto Raptors' Michale Kyser looks on during NBA basketball training camp in Burnaby, B.C., on September 29, 2015. The Toronto Raptors have released Shannon Scott, Axel Toupane, Michale Kyser and Ronald Roberts, leaving them with their 15-man roster ahead of the regular-season home opener against the Pacers. (DARRYL DYCK/THE CANADIAN PRESS) Toronto Raptors' Michale Kyser looks on during NBA basketball training camp in Burnaby, B.C., on September 29, 2015. The Toronto Raptors have released Shannon Scott, Axel Toupane, Michale Kyser and Ronald Roberts, leaving them with their 15-man roster ahead of the regular-season home opener against the Pacers.(DARRYL DYCK/THE CANADIAN PRESS) Toronto Raptors cut four players ahead of Wednesday’s season opener Add to ... TORONTO — The Canadian Press 
Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015 5:40PM EDT 
Last updated
